Today my 9 year old daughter came home from school without her winter jacket. When i asked her where is her jacket, she said: We have a  new girl in class for a week now , and she didn't had a jacket so i gave her mine.
My heart is full, full of joy.
Look at the person next to you, a small thing can change someone's  life and fulfil yours. Kindness is a powerful tool. Use it!

summary: I started my career in  Escrow for 16 years and transitioned into Mortgage Processing/Mortgage Origination for 7 years and then transitioned into Recruiting. I have enjoyed the Real Estate Industry and has been a passion for me  most of my life.  Now Recruiting for one of the top 10 Lenders in the Mortgage Industry has been a great opportunity to be a part of. We are committed to being a Movement of Change in the mortgage industry, in corporate cultures and in communities. Hiring Market Leaders, Sales Manager, Branch Managers and Loan Originators California and Las Vegas. Call me regarding any of these positions available. “The POSITIVE THINKER sees the INVISIBLE, feels the INTANGIBLE, and achieves the IMPOSSIBLE.” ― Winston S. ChurchillContact Sarah @ 623 218 8035 (m) or 949 236 4272 (o)  or send an email to sarah.torres@movement.com
